# GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/certificates | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/certificates ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates)

-  GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/certificates 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/certificates

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/certificates
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[ProfileCertificatesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/profilecertificateslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#see-also)

### [Getting Related Data](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-certificates#Getting-Related-Data)

[`Read the Bundle ID in a Profile`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-bundleid)Get the bundle ID information for a specific provisioning profile.[`GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/bundleId`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-bundleid)[`List All Certificates in a Profile`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-certificates)Get a list of all certificates and their data for a specific provisioning profile.[`List All Devices in a Profile`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-devices)Get a list of all devices for a specific provisioning profile.[`GET /v1/profiles/{id}/relationships/devices`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-profiles-_id_-relationships-devices)
